title: Iran Detains Opposition Leaders Following Talks with Trump Administration
summary_full: The detentions of politicians from Iran’s reformist opposition follow mass arrests and a string of repression tactics aimed at preventing further anti-government unrest.
summary_public: The detentions of politicians from Iran’s reformist opposition follow mass arrests and a string of repression tactics aimed at preventing further anti-government unrest.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Iran Detains Opposition Leaders Following Talks with Trump Administration
